Package de.lases.control.backing

Class ScientificForumBacking

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.backing.ScientificForumBacking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ViewScoped @Named public class ScientificForumBacking extends Object implements Serializable
Backing bean for the scientific forum page.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ScientificForumBacking

      public ScientificForumBacking()

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initialize the dtos and load data from the datasource where possible. Create objects for:
      • this scientific forum
      • The user input for a new editor
      • the science field input
      • the list of editors for this scientific forum
      • the list of science fields for this scientific forum
      • the list of global science fields
      • the own submission pagination.
      • the reviewed submission pagination.
      • the edited submission pagination.
      Additionally, load the global list of science fields from the datasource.

    • onLoad

      public void onLoad()
      Gets the id of the scientific forum in question from view params (after being called by a view action) and loads the data needed to display the page from the datasource:
      • th dto for this scientific forum
      • the list of editors for this scientific forum
      • the list of science fields for this scientific forum
      • the first page of the own submission pagination.
      • the fist page of the reviewed submission pagination.
      • the first page of the edited submission pagination.

    • preRenderViewListener

      public void preRenderViewListener​(jakarta.faces.event.ComponentSystemEvent event)
      Checks if the view param is an integer and throws an exception if it is not
      Parameters:
      event - The component system event that happens before rendering the view param.
      Throws:
      IllegalUserFlowException - If there is no integer provided as view param

    • deleteForum

      public String deleteForum()
      Delete the scientific forum and got to the homepage.
      Returns:
      Go to the homepage.

      Parameters:
      scienceField - Field to remove from the list.

    • submitChanges

      public void submitChanges()
      Submit all changes made to the forum that have nothing to do with the editor or scientific forum list.
